name: Win Condition
description:
Decimate your opponents with a single turn victory! Order your chain of cards to make them all as effective as can be in this short puzzle game.

This was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 (GMTK Game Jam 2021 - itch.io). The deadline was missed so a little longer was spent to polish up what we did. This was our first collaboration toghether and we learnt a lot from it. We hope you enjoy!

  • Left Click -> Interact
  • Esc -> Quit

8 Levels total, some with multiple solutions.

Created by:

  • Lukephos - Programming/Design
  • Luke Jones (@Lukephos) / Twitter
  • DoodleLesbian - Art/Levels/Design
  • KEZBIAN (@doodlelesbian) / Twitter
  • Ant Ray Audio - Music/SFX/Dynamic Audio
  • Home | Ant Ray Audio
